pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 12, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, January 12, 2017:

Manotick, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Miller’s Oven.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Brockville, Ontario  

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Aquatarium.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Kingston, Ontario

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Kingston City Hall
216 Ontario Street
Kingston, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m, in the John Counter Room.


3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Kingston City Hall, Ontario Hall
216 Ontario Street
Kingston, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:15 p.m, in the John Counter Room.


Napanee, Ontario

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit Ellena’s Cafe.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Belleville, Ontario

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

The Empire Theatre
321 Front Street
Belleville, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:30 p.m.


Quinte West, Ontario

7:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an Honour Guard at Canadian Forces Base Trenton.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only
